item.title: I Made Something Happen
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: I think Seth Godin might have been onto something with «Make something happen», so I did. Today was my last day at EVRY. Some might already have been aware of this, mostly because of Hoff-Job-Announcement-as-a-Service, but also because of my own tweet as I left the EVRY offices in Bergen as an employee for the last time: https://twitter.com/h0bbel/status/715526670254473217 The decision to leave EVRY was not an easy one,Â but it was time to try something else.
